item.title: changecontrol.v1
item.description: arista/changecontrol.v1/changecontrol.proto Action ApproveConfig Change ChangeConfig ChangeControl ChangeControlConfig ChangeControlKey Flag FlagConfig RepeatedRepeatedString Stage StageConfig StageConfigMap StageConfigMap.ValuesEntry StageMap StageMap.ValuesEntry TimestampFlag TimestampFlagConfig ChangeControlStatus StageStatus arista/changecontrol.v1/services.gen.proto ApproveConfigDeleteRequest ApproveConfigDeleteResponse ApproveConfigRequest ApproveConfigResponse ApproveConfigSetRequest ApproveConfigSetResponse ApproveConfigStreamRequest ApproveConfigStreamResponse ChangeControlConfigDeleteRequest ChangeControlConfigDeleteResponse ChangeControlConfigRequest ChangeControlConfigResponse ChangeControlConfigSetRequest ChangeControlConfigSetResponse ChangeControlConfigStreamRequest ChangeControlConfigStreamResponse ChangeControlRequest ChangeControlResponse ChangeControlStreamRequest ChangeControlStreamResponse ApproveConfigService ChangeControlConfigService ChangeControlService Top arista/changecontrol.v1/changecontrol.proto Action Action is an action to perform during the execution of a stage of a change control. Available actions can be fetched using the “action” services.

item.title: configstatus.v1
item.description: arista/configstatus.v1/configstatus.proto ConfigDiff ConfigDiffKey ConfigError ConfigErrors ConfigKey ConfigSummary Configuration DiffEntries DiffEntry Summary SummaryKey ConfigFilterCode ConfigSyncCode ConfigType DiffOp ErrorCode arista/configstatus.v1/services.gen.proto ConfigDiffRequest ConfigDiffResponse ConfigDiffStreamRequest ConfigDiffStreamResponse ConfigurationRequest ConfigurationResponse ConfigurationStreamRequest ConfigurationStreamResponse SummaryRequest SummaryResponse SummaryStreamRequest SummaryStreamResponse ConfigDiffService ConfigurationService SummaryService Top arista/configstatus.v1/configstatus.proto ConfigDiff Field Name Type Description key ConfigDiffKey Key represents config diff key uri google.protobuf.StringValue Uri represents the HTTP URI client can use to GET config diff and associated errors error ConfigError ConfigDiffKey ConfigDiffKey uniquely identifies a configuration diff request

item.title: dashboard.v1
item.description: arista/dashboard.v1/dashboard.proto Dashboard DashboardConfig DashboardKey DashboardMetadata Dimensions Filter GlobalDashboardConfig Position Widget WidgetStyles Widgets arista/dashboard.v1/services.gen.proto DashboardConfigDeleteAllRequest DashboardConfigDeleteAllResponse DashboardConfigDeleteRequest DashboardConfigDeleteResponse DashboardConfigRequest DashboardConfigResponse DashboardConfigSetRequest DashboardConfigSetResponse DashboardConfigStreamRequest DashboardConfigStreamResponse DashboardRequest DashboardResponse DashboardStreamRequest DashboardStreamResponse GlobalDashboardConfigRequest GlobalDashboardConfigResponse GlobalDashboardConfigSetRequest GlobalDashboardConfigSetResponse GlobalDashboardConfigStreamRequest GlobalDashboardConfigStreamResponse DashboardConfigService DashboardService GlobalDashboardConfigService Top arista/dashboard.v1/dashboard.proto Dashboard Dashboard state contains all dashboard data. Field Name Type Description key DashboardKey key is the unique identifier. It will always be defined. created_at google.protobuf.Timestamp created_at represents the date the dashboard was first created.

item.title: endpointlocation.v1
item.description: arista/endpointlocation.v1/endpointlocation.proto Device DeviceInfo DeviceMap DeviceMap.ValuesEntry EndpointLocation EndpointLocationKey ExplanationList Identifier IdentifierList IdentifierSourceList Location LocationList DeviceStatus DeviceType Explanation IdentifierSource IdentifierType Likelihood MacType arista/endpointlocation.v1/services.gen.proto EndpointLocationRequest EndpointLocationResponse EndpointLocationStreamRequest EndpointLocationStreamResponse EndpointLocationService Top arista/endpointlocation.v1/endpointlocation.proto Device Field Name Type Description identifier_list IdentifierList device_type DeviceType location_list LocationList The list of possible locations, in order from most likely to least likely device_status DeviceStatus device_info DeviceInfo DeviceInfo Field Name Type Description device_name google.protobuf.StringValue mobile google.protobuf.BoolValue tablet google.protobuf.BoolValue score google.protobuf.UInt32Value version google.

item.title: event.v1

item.title: identityprovider.v1
item.description: arista/identityprovider.v1/identityprovider.proto OAuthConfig OAuthKey SAMLConfig SAMLKey ProtocolBinding arista/identityprovider.v1/services.gen.proto OAuthConfigDeleteAllRequest OAuthConfigDeleteAllResponse OAuthConfigDeleteRequest OAuthConfigDeleteResponse OAuthConfigRequest OAuthConfigResponse OAuthConfigSetRequest OAuthConfigSetResponse OAuthConfigStreamRequest OAuthConfigStreamResponse SAMLConfigDeleteAllRequest SAMLConfigDeleteAllResponse SAMLConfigDeleteRequest SAMLConfigDeleteResponse SAMLConfigRequest SAMLConfigResponse SAMLConfigSetRequest SAMLConfigSetResponse SAMLConfigStreamRequest SAMLConfigStreamResponse OAuthConfigService SAMLConfigService Top arista/identityprovider.v1/identityprovider.proto OAuthConfig OAuthConfig holds the configuration for an OAuth provider. Field Name Type Description key OAuthKey key is the ID of the OAuth provider. endpoint google.protobuf.StringValue endpoint is the URL that identifies an OAuth authorization server. This endpoint is used to interact with the provider.

item.title: inventory.v1

item.title: redirector.v1
item.description: arista/redirector.v1/redirector.proto Assignment AssignmentKey Cluster Clusters arista/redirector.v1/services.gen.proto AssignmentRequest AssignmentResponse AssignmentStreamRequest AssignmentStreamResponse AssignmentService Top arista/redirector.v1/redirector.proto Assignment Assignment returns the information about the regional clusters that the system is assigned to. Each cluster consists of a series of hosts, each of which the client can use to connect. Field Name Type Description key AssignmentKey key uniquely identifies the assignment of system_id to the cluster. clusters Clusters clusters that the system is assigned to.
